name: QuoteAway
description: QuoteAway is a social media website where users to share and see other people's quotes. Uses Http basic authentication for login logout using spring security. Any logged in user can see other peoples quotes and create their own.
stack: React, Spring boot, MySQL, Spring data JPA

name: Bank Application
description: A web application that imitates bank operations such as deposit, withdraw, transfer and balance enquiry, fixed deposit and loans. Involves multi threading concepts for EMI payment and interest calculation.
